text: Came here to take an exam on a weekday afternoon. Quiet, cooling and conducive test room. Pens provided all ran out of ink, but I liked that I could do some revision in the waiting area with complimentary hot drinks.

Went here to take exam. The place is rather easy to get to. Near the bus stop you alight.
Access to the place is normal during Covid period. Trace together and check in. Start the exam. Exam room is nice and quiet.
Nice place to train and take cert. Exam
Nice and peaceful place to take exams for certifications. Strangely can no longer find this location for Pearson exams nowadays.
I was calling your hotline yet after 1 hrs wait. Your operator still busy.. Is that the service level you provided.
